Chinese police crack down on 'Apple ID loan' rackets, some of which were advertised under Tim Cook's name.	Police in China have arrested more than 40 people in relation to fraudulent schemes that target iPhone users in the country, whereby people give up their personal Apple IDs to obtain a loan, allowing the lenders to abuse their accounts.
